original_text: About eight days after Jesus had said these things, he went up a mountain to pray. He took Peter, John and James with him.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하신 후 팔 일쯤 되어 예수께서 베드로와 요한과 야고보를 데리고 기도하시러 산에 올라가사

sentences.original_text: About eight days after Jesus had said these things
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하신 지 약 8일 후에

sentences.original_text: he went up a mountain to pray
He took Peter, John and James with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 베드로, 요한, 야고보를 데리고 가셨다
